SQL.LOAD: SELECT service_class_id, service_type_id, schedule_id, service_center_id, effective, expiration, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, service_schedule_id FROM elp_service_schedule WHERE service_schedule_id = :service_schedule_id
SQL.LOAD_SERVICE_CENTER_SCHEDULE_LIST: Select Distinct ss.service_schedule_id, ss.service_class_id, ss.service_type_id, ss.schedule_id, ss.service_center_id, ss.effective, ss.expiration, ss.created_by, ss.modified_by, ss.created_date, ss.modified_date from elp_service_schedule ss join elp_schedule s on ss.schedule_id = s.schedule_id where ss.service_center_id = :service_center_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_service_schedule SET service_class_id = :service_class_id, service_type_id = :service_type_id, schedule_id = :schedule_id, service_center_id = :service_center_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE service_schedule_id = :service_schedule_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_service_schedule ( service_class_id, service_type_id, schedule_id, service_center_id, effective, expiration, created_by, service_schedule_id ) VALUES ( :service_class_id, :service_type_id, :schedule_id, :service_center_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :service_schedule_id )
SQL.GET_SERVICE_CENTER_SCHEDULE_TABLE: select s.SCHEDULE_ID, s.CODE, s.DESCRIPTION, s.CREATED_BY, s.MODIFIED_BY, s.CREATED_DATE, s.MODIFIED_DATE, ss.SERVICE_SCHEDULE_ID, ss.SERVICE_CLASS_ID, ss.SERVICE_TYPE_ID, ss.SCHEDULE_ID, ss.SERVICE_CENTER_ID, ss.EFFECTIVE, ss.EXPIRATION from elp_schedule s join elp_service_schedule ss on s.schedule_id = ss.schedule_id where ss.schedule_id = :schedule_id
